duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage project activities, such as facilitating project team meetings, aiding in test script writing and UAT, preparing & delivering status reports, issue tracking and risk mitigation, establishing and tracking milestones, monitoring of critical path items and implementation of appropriate corrective actions.
Coordinate day-to-day activities for assigned projects.
Communicate project status to project managers and senior management and provide input in the preparation of business cases for review with the IT Project Review Board.
Coordinate internal IT team resources, external partner teams, managed service providers and consultants as required.
Work with America’s Zone B2B Service Delivery Team to investigate system failures and identify solutions to prevent or minimize impacts.
Propose sustainable standardized technical solutions across the Zone.
Follow change management process to capture change requests, communicate impact, request stakeholder decisions, and execute changes if applicable.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Services, Business or equivalent experience.
Project Management Institute (PMI), Agile Certification (CSM, PSM, ACP) or other IT industry project management certification preferred.
